headline: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Secures $400M Contract to Power THAAD Interceptors
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is among the 11 best military technology stocks to buy right now. On February 16, the company announced that it had landed a contract worth around $400 million to power THAAD interceptors. Under the agreement, the defense contractor will manufacture and supply additional solid rocket boost motors and Liquid Divert and […]
